class.name: xbkTree
class.desc: The xbkTree class display information in a hierarchal tree system.

param.name: inst
param.comment: The name or id to be use for this xbkMenu.

param.name: parent
param.comment: The parent of the xbkMenu object if it has one.

method.name: setImagePath
method.method_desc: Set the path for the image location folder.

method.name: getChildNode
method.method_desc: Creates a child xbkTreeNode and return it.

param.name: text
param.comment: Text that appears for the item.

param.name: fHandler
param.comment: Reference to a handler function for this xbkTreeNode.

return.comment: Reference to a xbkTreeNode note: see xbkTreeNode class

method.name: getParentNode
method.method_desc: Creates a parent xbkTreeNode and return it.

param.name: text
param.comment: Text that appears for the item.

param.name: fHandler
param.comment: Reference to a handler function for this xbkTreeNode.

param.name: closeImg
param.comment: Image to use for folder close.

param.name: openImg
param.comment: Image to use for folder open.

return.comment: Reference to a xbkTreeNode note: see xbkTreeNode class

method.name: addRoot
method.method_desc: Add a root xbkTreeNode to the current xbkTree.

param.name: node
param.comment: A xbkTreeNode to be added to the root level.

method.name: removeNode
method.method_desc: Remove a node by id from the current xbkTree.
